application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been provided regarding on-site samples and details for all parts of the condition, including facing materials, doors/shopfront(s)/dummy door material and framing, balustrades, canopies, parapets, spandrel panels and the like. In the absence of full details, the Local Planning Authority is therefore unable to fully assess whether the proposal development would provide satisfactory details to discharge all parts of Condition 5 (materials) of the proposed development contrary to policy D3 of The London Plan (2021), policy CS1 of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to condition 5 (materials) attached to planning permission P/2515/21 dated 16/03/2022 for Creation of two additional storeys comprising 16 x shared accommodation units with associated communal areas. Two storey rear extension at ground and lower ground level. Alterations to front and rear facades and creation of new entrances to ground and lower ground co-working space. Change of use from former bank (Use Class E(c)(i)) to Co-Working Office Space (Use Class E(c)(iii)). Cycle and bin stores at ground and lower ground level and creation of 4 disabled bays and landscaping at the rear and other external alterations
